bio: When a battle starts, Slitheref will appear out of nowhere and make sure the fight stays fair and square.

soultimate.name: Venomous Feint
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' attack is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Slows down Move Meter loss by 15%.
skill.name: Staying Power

name: Slitheref
